submission_open_modal.title: Want to represent your country on a big stage?
submission_open_modal.description: Eurovision is a renowned international song contest uniting nations through music. Now, Eurovision Asia brings this spectacular event to our region! If you sing, perform, or write songs, seize this unique opportunity to showcase your talent and be part of a truly special global musical journey.

submit_your_audition.title: Submit your audition
submit_your_audition.description_placeholder: Add a short description to your audition.
submit_your_audition.info_text: This video will be reviewed by AI first, then by human judges. You may only submit one audition per account. Once submitted, videos cannot be edited or replaced.
submit_your_audition.video_audition_guidelines_content: Record yourself singing a cover or original song. This will be your official audition for Eurovision Asia. Please follow the steps and requirements below carefully.
submit_your_audition.technical_requirements_content:
Video format: .mp4 or .mov 
Minimum resolution: 720 × 1280 (portrait) 
Minimum duration: 3 minutes (180 seconds) 
Maximum file size: 500 MB 
Lighting: Bright and even (e.g. in front of a window) 
Audio: Clear and audible—avoid background noise
submit_your_audition.recording_instructions_content:
Perform one full song, either a cover or an original. 
Perform live — lip-syncing, filters, or heavy post-processing will lead to disqualification. 
Make sure your face and voice are clearly visible and audible at all times.
submit_your_audition.tips_for_better_quality_content:
Use a tripod or stable surface to keep your camera still. 
Record in a quiet indoor environment. 
Preview your video before uploading to check clarity and audio. 
Dress as if you're on stage—your style and personality matter!
